column2: Professional Development provided for Teachers\r\rMeasure2017-182018-192019-20\rNumber of school days dedicated to Staff Development and Continuous Improvement333\r\rAnnually at the start of every school year
column3: the district provides at a minimum three (3) full days of professional development for teachers.  The first day\rbeing dedicated to district-human resources topics such as sexual harassment and mandated reporting obligations.  The other two days are dedicated\raddress site specific matters and student needs.\r\rThe following trainings and professional learning opportunities for teachers took place during minimum days as well as other designated days throughout\rthe year.\r\r2018 - 2019 School Year\rDATE           PROFESSIONAL LEARNING\r8/15/18        Data Review/Goal Setting\r8/22/18        F&P Refresher\r8/29/18        Grade Level PLC\r9/5/18          Lock down review\r9/12/18        Progress Report Data/PLC\r9/19/18        Guided Reading Review\r9/26/18        Instructional Rounds\r10/17/18      Q1 Data Review/RtI\r11/7/18        RtI/Guided Reading\r11/26/18      Guided Reading\r12/5/18        Lock down review/PLC\r1/9/19          Q2 Data Review\r1/23/19        PD Overview/Debrief\r2/6/19          Instructional Rounds/Guided Reading\r2/13/19        Data Review/RtI Adjusting\r2/20/19        SWUN overview\r3/6/19          SWUN Debrief/Share out\r3/13/19        Grade Level Planning\r3/20/19        Q3 Data Review\r4/3/19          Lock down/reunification plan\r4/10/19        Guided Reading - next steps\r4/24/19        RtI\r5/1/19          CA School Safety Survey\r5/22/19        PLC PD\r\r2017 - 2018 School Year\rDate                 Professional Learning\r8/9/17               ESGI Training (Assessment/Data Entry System)\r9/5/17               Promethean Board Training\r9/9
